title: Home
welcomeText:
![](/images/uploads/intro-bg.jpg) # Yo, I'm Bluise - A Nuxt.js & Netlify CMS boilerplate. Hello, my name is Dan and I am the co-owner of a small real estate company. We are looking to purchase some properties in your area for investment purposes. We buy properties others no longer want (inherited, tired of paying taxes, live out of area) or need to sell (foreclosure, tax sale, etc.) In the past, we have worked with a number of people who were very happy to have cash rather than the trouble of their unwanted property. We work to make it easy for you to sell your land and eliminate your real estate nuisance. In return for selling your property at a discount, we can offer a number of reasons to work with us: * pay 100% of your closing costs
* help avoid realtor's fees
* satisfy back taxes and fees
* close in 30 days or less (if the title is clear) By the way, none of this costs you a dime. {#If you would like an immediate offer on your property, please fill out the form below with as much information as possible. The first 4 fields are needed, but the more you can give us the faster we can act. #} If you would like an immediate offer on your property, please fill out the form below. We will get back to you within 24 hours by email. Whatever you decide, Best Wishes, Dan, Open Land LLC.
seoDescription: A quickstart for Nuxt & Netlify CMS
